text:
Safeguarding data is important
to your business and as you scale

protecting mission critical application
data across cloud

and hybrid environments
becomes a challenge.

Without data protection,
your business risks data loss

from disasters, accidental deletions,
ransomware, and compliance issues.
These events can cost time and resources.

With AWS backup,
you can leverage centralized

automated backup and recovery for AWS
services and hybrid workloads.
It simplifies data protection,

helping to safeguard data
and meet compliance requirements.

Secure your AWS estate
and hybrid environments with immutable

and logically air-gapped vaults,
helping to provide

defense-in-depth protection
from ransomware and disasters.

Verified Data
Protection plans with restore testing

helping to build trust
in your recovery strategy

by ensuring data is recovered
when it's needed.

Use AWS Backup
Audit Manager to monitor, audit and report

on data protection
compliance across protected AWS resources
such as Amazon S3
Amazon EBS
Amazon EC2
Amazon DynamoDB
and Amazon RDS.

Aligning to your organizational
or regulatory requirements.

AWS backup
can help you protect application data,

streamline backup and recovery processes,
and reduce operational overhead

by centralizing
and automating data protection.

You can free up time and resources
to focus on what truly matters.
Growing your business.
Get started with AWS backup today.
